project_abstract.cdata: The Second Small Industries Project will provide credit to promote investments in promising small scale industries (SSI) and to accelerate modernization and improve productivity of existing SSI units. To complement the credit scheme, technical assistance will be provided to SSIs through the provincial Small Industries Corporations and the federal Ministry of Industries in project identification and investment promotion, project preparation and extension services, and management training.  Present Government policies argue well for continued growth in the industrial sector generally and among SSIs in particular.
